Not much has changed with the camera,...
...except how you take a photo, find a photo, share a photo.
Oh, Mom's gonna love that one.
Your photos themselves have changed, too.
So photos of your friends can do this...
...and the ones of your family can do that...
and your pet photos can do...
Oh, now your screen is the flash.
And the camera shoots video in 4K,...
You can even shoot slo-mo in HD.
